name: generate_random_string
description: Generates a random string of a specified length and character types, including uppercase letters, lowercase letters, digits, and special characters.

length.description: The length of the random string.

uppercase.description: Include uppercase letters in the random string. Defaults to true.

lowercase.description: Include lowercase letters in the random string. Defaults to true.

digits.description: Include digits in the random string. Defaults to true.

special_chars.description: Include special characters in the random string. Defaults to false.
